author: blair
msg: Whitespace cleanup.
* subversion/bindings/java/javahl/native:
Associate the * and the & with the function or variable.
Other indenation fixes.
Doing a 'svn diff --diff-cmd diff -x -uw' will show only line
wrapping changes.

author: pburba
msg: Split merge info elision and issue #2733/#2734 test into two separate tests.
Yes, we should be reluctant to make more tests than we need, but this test
was trying to do a bit too much.  Moreover issues #2733-2734 are fixed and
elision is unimplemented.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(setup_branch): Return expected status, it's useful to some callers.
(local_mergeinfo_elision_and_inheritance): Removed, splitting into the two
separate tests below.
(mergeinfo_inheritance): New test that covers only issue #2733 and
issue #2734.  Improved the comments, because honestly, they stunk (e.g.
don't call it elision when it's really repeat merge avoidance!)
(mergeinfo_elision): New test focusing strictly on elision.
(test_list): Remove local_mergeinfo_elision_and_inheritance and add the two
tests which replace it.  Set mergeinfo_elision test to XFail as this is not
currently implemented.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/bindings/java/javahl/src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/tests/SVNTests.java
(MyCommitItem.test): Reorder parameters in assert statements so that error
messages correctly state what was received, and what was expected.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r23846 from trunk, allowing clients to checkout repositories over ra_serf
when the root is forbidden.
Approved by: +1: jerenkrantz, dlr, cmpilato

author: hwright
msg: Merge r23491 and r23492 from trunk.  This fixes a hang during character
translation (r23492), and theoretically improves memory usage in an edge case
Approved by: +1: malcolm, dlr, cmpilato
